name: Iceberg Lettuce With Blue Cheese Dressing
recipeCategory: easy, quick, weekday, salads and dressings
keywords: blue cheese, iceberg lettuce, gluten-free, vegetarian
recipeIngredient: 1 tablespoon freshly squeezed lemon juice, or more as needed
1 head iceberg lettuce, cored and cut into 8 wedges
1/2 cup toasted and chopped hazelnuts, pecans or walnuts, optional

recipeInstructions.text: Mash yogurt with blue cheese, lemon juice, a pinch of salt, and a grinding or two of pepper. Taste and adjust the seasoning, adding more lemon juice if necessary.
Place each wedge of iceberg lettuce on a plate, drizzle with dressing and sprinkle with nuts if using.
